key_drivers: Real yields falling (DFII10 at 1.79%, declining from ~2.0%) — bullish for gold, tech, and all risk assets; weighted 2x for GC, ES, NQ
USD structural weakness (DXY 97.789, -1.01% 1-month, -8.15% 1-year) providing broad tailwind for commodities and non-USD FX
BOJ hawkish hiking cycle (0.75% → 1.0% expected by June 2026) driving JPY strength; BoJ stance +2 and rate differential widening +2 = STRONG_BULLISH 6J
EIA crude draw of 9.0M barrels (week ending Feb 13) tightens oil market; oil supply shock weighted 2x for CL
Risk environment constructive: MOVE index -5.53% (64.27), VIX falling to 19.09, credit spreads at historic lows (HY OAS 2.88%), SOX near all-time high (8,260)
